name: doubao-speech-marketplace
description: ByteDance Volcano Engine Speech Services - TTS and ASR plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: doubao-tts
plugins.description: Text-to-Speech synthesis using Doubao (ByteDance) TTS V3 API. Supports 100+ voice types, emotions, speed control, and multiple audio formats (mp3/wav/pcm/ogg_opus). Convert text to natural-sounding speech with customizable voices.

plugins.name: doubao-asr
plugins.description: Speech-to-Text recognition using Doubao (ByteDance) ASR API. Supports streaming recognition, WAV/MP3 formats, ITN (Inverse Text Normalization), punctuation, and Chinese/English speech transcription.
